snippet: A front-page article on Monday about how the booming economy is helping California improve the national ranking of its schools misstated the size ranking of California's coastline (in a reference to how the state compares to other states). Its coa...
lead_paragraph: A front-page article on Monday about how the booming economy is helping California improve the national ranking of its schools misstated the size ranking of California's coastline (in a reference to how the state compares to other states). Its coastline is the second longest among the 48 contiguous states, not the longest. Florida's is the longest.
abstract: Correction of June 26 article on improvement in California school
section_name: Education; Corrections; New York and Region
